Title: Sveriges Radio Play
Description:
This is an Open Source variant of Sveriges Radio Play application for Windows Phone 7.5

Please follow or participate in the project!!!!!!


- This is a very new app and is therefore not available on Windows Phone Marketplace.

- Developed in C# and Silverlight for Windows Phone 7.5 Mango Release only.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is an Open Source variant of Sveriges Radio Play application for Windows Phone 7.1

Please follow or participate in the project!!!!!!


- This is a very new app and is therefore not available on Windows Phone Marketplace.

- Developed in C# and Silverlight for Windows Phone 7.5 Mango Release only.

Loading screen Direct channels Player Programs
